item.title: Spike fin blade
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:4, topic:277725”]no offence but that isnt going anywhere, a good way to start would b to go to the top right hand corner and clicking the box with a square split into 4 pieces which splits ur screen into 4 pieces. then on the left side bar click “create” and set it to “line” and “both”, then on the top bar where u c IMG right click it and under “top” upload a big pic of something u want to make
then click to make points and trace ur picture out.[/quote]
Exactly. Look at CJ’s tut if you have a problem.

BTW, You need to learn to not use primitives and just MAKE it all

Read full topic

item.title: Spike fin blade
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

no offence but that isnt going anywhere, a good way to start would b to go to the top right hand corner and clicking the box with a square split into 4 pieces which splits ur screen into 4 pieces. then on the left side bar click “create” and set it to “line” and “both”, then on the top bar where u c IMG right click it and under “top” upload a big pic of something u want to make
then click to make points and trace ur picture out.

Read full topic

@CoonHunter wrote:

eeh, i’ll admit it could be ALOT better… try starting out with primitives like i did tho, its simple and easy when u start out with those… (and P.S. i wouldnt worry about positioning yet…

heres link for my first…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and basically after you get that all done. and a deceint model… just play around with it (P.S. iw ould make a backup of it first lol)
